Package com.matrixone.apps.domain.util

Provides domain utility classes for the VCP applications.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
AbortedException The AbortedException class represents the exception thrown by all the bean methods.
AccessUtil The AccessUtil class represents a utility class for manipulating accesses in the AEF.
AppVersionUtil The AppVersionUtil class implements utility methods used by other classes in the AEF.
BackgroundProcess The BackgroundProcess class is used to carry out an action in a seperate thread
ContextUtil The ContextUtil class contains static methods for context-related activities.
DateUtil The DateUtil class represents the class which has static methods to evaluate start date, finish date, duration
DebugUtil The DebugUtil class contains static methods that can be used to print debug messages.
DecoratedOid  
eMatrixDateFormat  
FormatUtil The FormatUtil class represents the "format" admin type in the AEF.
FrameworkException The FrameworkException class represents the exception thrown by all the bean methods.
FrameworkProperties The FrameworkProperties class is used make the application properties available to the Framework beans.
FrameworkUtil The FrameworkUtil class implements utility methods used by other classes in the AEF.
i18nNow This class take a string reource key and returns a localizaed strings in a JSP page.
MailUtil The MailUtil class implements utility mail methods used by other classes in the AEF.
MapList The MapList class is used to store a list of map objects.
MessageUtil The StringUtil class contains static methods for string-related activities.
MqlUtil The MqlUtil class contains static methods that can be used to execute mql commands.
mxAttr The mxAttr class provides tools for the Java developer to easily manipulate and retrieve information about Business Attribute.
mxBus The mxBus class provides tools for the Java developer to easily manipulate and retrieve information about BusinessObjects.
mxType The mxType class provides tools for the Java developer to easily manipulate and retrieve information about Business Types.
MyFtpInputStream  
MyOutputStream  
ObjectCompare  
OrganizationUtil The VaultDomainUtil class contains static methods for attribute-related activities.
PersonUtil The PersonUtil class implements utility methods related to Perosn type in AEF
PolicyUtil The PolicyUtil class contains utility methods for policy
ProgramUtil The ProgramUtil class contains static methods for JPO-related activities.
PropertyUtil The PropertyUtil class contains static methods that can be used to access properties from beans or JPOs.
RegistrationUtil The RegistrationUtil class represents the Admin type property Registration, Create,Transfer,Update and Delete the registration of the admin type objects and the registering of newly created lifecycle states of an existing or new policy.
Request The Request class provides tools for accessing information about the Request object.
SetUtil The SetUtil class contains static methods for set-related activities.
TriggerUtil  
UOMUtil  
VaultUtil The VaultUtil class contains static methods for attribute-related activities.
 

Package com.matrixone.apps.domain.util Description

Provides domain utility classes for the VCP applications.
